FuncDef: This command configures the amount of bandwidth available within a given bundle for MC traffic for a specified level. The amount of allowable BW for the specified level is expressed in kb/s and this can be defined for up to eight different levels.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the bandwidth for a given level. Level 1 has the highest priority. Level 8 has the lowest priority. Values-1 to 8.
Specifies the bandwidth, in kb/s, for the level. Values-1 to 2147483647 kb/s. ParamDefault: Default- 1

ExtraInfo: Default: none (If no bandwidth is defined for a given level then no limit is applied.)
